chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
a: nat

Goal:
list_an a (S n) = a :: list_an (S a) n

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
list_an = fix list_an (a n : nat) {struct n} : list nat := match n with | 0 => nil | S n0 => a :: list_an (S a) n0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments list_an (_ _)%nat_scope
firstn_cons : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (a : A) (l : list A), firstn (S n) (a :: l) = a :: firstn n l
nth_S_cons : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d a : A), In (nth n l d) l -> In (nth (S n) (a :: l) d) (a :: l)
skipn_cons : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (a : A) (l : list A), skipn (S n) (a :: l) = skipn n l
cons_seq : forall len start : nat, start :: seq (S start) len = seq start (S len)
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
repeat_to_concat : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (a : A), repeat a n = concat (repeat (a :: nil) n)
ZMicromega.xhyps_of_pt = fix xhyps_of_pt (base : nat) (acc : list nat) (pt : ZMicromega.ZArithProof) {struct pt} : list nat := match pt with | ZMicromega.DoneProof => acc | ZMicromega.RatProof c pt0 | ZMicromega.CutProof c pt0 => xhyps_of_pt (S base) (RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz base acc c) pt0 | ZMicromega.EnumProof c1 c2 l => let acc0 := RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz base (RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz base acc c2) c1 in fold_left (xhyps_of_pt (S base)) l acc0 | ZMicromega.ExProof _ pt0 => xhyps_of_pt (S (S (S base))) acc pt0 end : nat -> list nat -> ZMicromega.ZArithProof -> list nat Arguments ZMicromega.xhyps_of_pt _%nat_scope _%list_scope
repeat_cons : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (a : A), a :: repeat a n = repeat a n ++ a :: nil
seq_S : forall len start : nat, seq start (S len) = seq start len ++ start + len :: nil
seq_shift : forall len start : nat, map S (seq start len) = seq (S start) len
BinNatDef.N.div_eucl = fun a b : BinNums.N => match a with | BinNums.N0 => (BinNums.N0, BinNums.N0) | BinNums.Npos na => match b with | BinNums.N0 => (BinNums.N0, a) | BinNums.Npos _ => BinNatDef.N.pos_div_eucl na b end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> BinNums.N * BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.div_eucl (_ _)%N_scope
VectorDef.to_list = fun (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A n) => (fix fold_right_fix (n0 : nat) (v0 : VectorDef.t A n0) (b : list A) {struct v0} : list A := match v0 with | VectorDef.nil _ => b | VectorDef.cons _ a n1 w => a :: fold_right_fix n1 w b end) n v nil : forall (A : Type) (n : nat), VectorDef.t A n -> list A Arguments VectorDef.to_list {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
seq = fix seq (start len : nat) {struct len} : list nat := match len with | 0 => nil | S len0 => start :: seq (S start) len0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments seq (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.max_assoc : forall m n p : nat, Nat.max m (Nat.max n p) = Nat.max (Nat.max m n) p
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = a :: nil -> x = nil /\ y = a :: nil \/ x = a :: nil /\ y = nil
rev_unit : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (a : A), rev (l ++ a :: nil) = a :: rev l
Permutation_length_1_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), a :: nil ~p l -> l = a :: nil
Permutation_vs_cons_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a b : A), l ~p a :: b :: l' -> exists l1 l2 l3 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3 \/ l = l1 ++ b :: l2 ++ a :: l3
app_inj_tail : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a b : A), x ++ a :: nil = y ++ b :: nil -> x = y /\ a = b
Permutation_vs_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (l l1 : list A) (a : A), l ~p a :: l1 -> exists l' l'' : list A, l = l' ++ a :: l''
elt_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A) (a b : A), l1 ++ a :: l2 = b :: nil -> a = b /\ l1 = nil /\ l2 = nil
Permutation_cons_app_inv : forall (A : Type) (l l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), a :: l ~p l1 ++ a :: l2 -> l ~p l1 ++ l2
map_last : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (a : A), map f (l ++ a :: nil) = map f l ++ f a :: nil
Permutation_vs_elt_inv : forall (A : Type) (l l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), l ~p l1 ++ a :: l2 -> exists l' l'' : list A, l = l' ++ a :: l''
hd_error_tl_repr : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (a : A) (r : list A), hd_error l = Some a /\ tl l = r < -> l = a :: r
in_app_or : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ m) -> In a l \/ In a m
Tauto.map_simpl : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = match l with | nil => nil | a :: l0 => f a :: map f l0 end
Permutation_elt_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 l3 : list B) (l4 : list A) (a : B), l1 ++ a :: l2 ~p l3 ++ map f l4 -> (forall b : A, a <> f b) -> exists l1' l2' : list B, l3 = l1' ++ a :: l2'
partition_cons2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (a : A) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> f a = false -> partition f (a :: l) = (l1, a :: l2)
list_max_le : forall (l : list nat) (n : nat), list_max l <= n < -> Forall (fun k : nat => k <= n) l
Add_split : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ l2 /\ l' = l1 ++ a :: l2
Permutation_morph_transp : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), (forall (a b : A) (l1 l2 : list A), P (l1 ++ a :: b :: l2) -> P (l1 ++ b :: a :: l2)) -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful (Permutation (A:=A)) Basics.impl) P
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope
list_max_lt : forall (l : list nat) (n : nat), l <> nil -> list_max l < n < -> Forall (fun k : nat => k < n) l
BinNatDef.N.to_nat = fun a : BinNums.N => match a with | BinNums.N0 => 0 | BinNums.Npos p => BinPos.Pos.to_nat p end : BinNums.N -> nat Arguments BinNatDef.N.to_nat _%N_scope
map_eq_cons : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (b : B), map f l = b :: l' -> exists (a : A) (tl : list A), l = a :: tl /\ f a = b /\ map f tl = l'
in_eq : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a (a :: l)
app_comm_cons : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), a :: x ++ y = (a :: x) ++ y
